name: GetManualStartWorkflows
description:
Retrieve workflows with manual start triggers for a folder.

Use this tool to get workflows associated with a specific folder ID that have a manual start trigger type. Ensure your application is authorized to use the 'Manage Box Relay' application scope.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier representing a folder. You can find this by visiting the folder in the web application and copying the ID from the URL. The root folder is always represented by ID '0'.

value_schema.description:
The unique identifier that represent a folder.

The ID for any folder can be determined
by visiting this folder in the web application
and copying the ID from the URL. For example,
for the URL `https://*.app.box.com/folder/123`
the `folder_id` is `123`.

The root folder of a Box account is
always represented by the ID `0`.

parameters.name: trigger_type_filter
parameters.description: Specify the trigger type to search for in workflows. Use 'WORKFLOW_MANUAL_START' for manual triggers.

value_schema.description: Type of trigger to search for.

parameters.name: max_items_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of workflows to retrieve per page. Adjust based on your needs to control pagination.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: pagination_marker
parameters.description: Specifies the position marker to start returning results. Used for marker-based pagination and requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.
